name: Wheat Berry Salad with Olives and Garlic
author: cuceesprouts
summary: You can substitute wheat berries with farro, spelt, or any other grain. Optionally, you can pre-soak the wheat berries overnight.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon olive oil, or as needed
1 cup pitted and finely chopped kalamata olives
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan; add wheat berries, lower heat to medium-low, and cook until wheat berries are tender and water is absorbed, 1 to 1 1/2 hours
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-low heat; saute garlic until fragrant, 1 to 2 minutes
Add olives; cook and stir for 10 minutes
Add wheat berries to olive mixture
Cook and stir wheat berries-olive mixture until heated through, about 5 minutes
